channel.title: Jiao Xiong on Universal
channel.description: Recent content in Jiao Xiong on Universal

item.title: Xiangzhang economic academic seminar
item.description: Phd student Jiao Xiong attended the Xiangzhang economic academic seminar and made an academic report titled “Technological change from fossil-fuel to renewable: Evidence from offshore energy”.

item.title: CNCC Green Bag
item.description: PhD student Jiao Xiong participated in CNCC Green Bag and gave an academic report titled “Technological change from fossil-fuel to renewable: Evidence from offshore energy”.
